meanings.definition: To move in a clumsy, heavy, or noisy manner.
meanings.sent1: The elephant galumphs through the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The toddler galumphs around the room, knocking over toys.
meanings.sent3: The bear galumphs comically as it tries to dance.
meanings.sent4: The giant robot galumphs across the city, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The hippo galumphs into the water, creating a big splash.

meanings.definition: A clumsy, heavy, or noisy movement.
meanings.sent1: The galumphs of the elephant echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The galumphs of the clumsy knight could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The galumphs of the penguin sliding on the ice were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The galumphs of the old car struggling up the hill were reminiscent of a tired horse.
meanings.sent5: The galumphs of the giant robot shook the ground with each step.
